DataElement.preferredName: Observation Study Protocol Document Observation And Enrollment Time Relationship Code TimePerspectiveType
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._Watching something and taking note of what happens.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation._The code that represents the temporal relationship of observation period to time of subject enrollment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredName: Observation And Enrollment Time Relationship Code
Property.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/7/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that represents the temporal relationship of observation period to time of subject enrollment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A study in which participants are examined at only a single time for characteristics of a disease.

Concepts.definition: A study in which participants are examined once for a characteristic, such as disease, at a single point in time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A chronological study in which participants are studied over time, with data being collected at multiple intervals.

Concepts.definition: A study in which participants are followed and repeatedly evaluated over a period of time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A study in which known outcomes are examined in hindsight using existing records.

Concepts.definition: A study in which participants with known outcomes are assessed based on data collected before the study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/22/2021wz: released for UML model cleanup project.
